name: Hilton Garden Inn Lecce

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here two nights during our bicycle trip. The hotel was fantastic. The room was perfectly comfortable, the water hot with great water pressure, the breakfast was the best we have seen and the staff was superb. We would love to return. The location worked perfectly... we love to walk.
reviews.title: Great Property! Great Stay! Great Staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was very nice for an amazing price. The lobby was large and very nice, the elevator was fast and the rooms were quiet. The hotel had many amenities that most Italian hotels don't. It had a swimming pool and a washer and dryer available for guest use on the 7th floor for 3 Euro a wash and 3 Euro for a dry which was great for us traveling for 2 weeks with only carry on bags. The room was large and spacious and very new and clean. The bathroom was also a great size. Their breakfast buffet was simply amazing. It had eggs you could boil, waffles to make with toppings, a large selection of fresh fruit, yogurt, pastries, bread, dried fruit and some hot dishes as well like sausage etc. It was the best breakfast at a hotel I have ever seen. The onsite restaurant seemed lovely but was pretty pricey, we preferred to eat at local restaurant in the city center. The only small drawback was it is not really centrally located. It is about a 10-15 minute walk to the center of town and the train station is 30-40 minutes, basically on the opposite side of town, but all the positives definitely override that. The front desk staff said a taxi to the train station would be 15-17 Euro. The hotel was also about 20 minute walk from the bus station. Overall this hotel was superb and I would gladly stay here again and recommend it to anyone.
reviews.title: Amazing Hotel for an Amazing Price, Not Centrally Located

reviews.text: Five nights stayed at this hotel.
reviews.title: I had a great stay - Business Trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good points - Location was good 20 minute walk to Town Centre, 10 minute walk to some nice resturants. Room itself had no complaints had a balcony on this stay and is worth asking for. Pool was nice and gym is open 24 hours a day with your key card access. Breakfast was fine - Evening meal was ok just typical small fancy portions which cost a lot. Prefered to eat in local restuarants. All staff spoke relatively good English. Easy access to main roads/ring roads.
reviews.title: Typical Hilton but with Italian idiosyncrasies
Hilton exactly as you expect it to be

reviews.text: We found the hotel to be all you might expect for a 4* standard. The trims were well appointed and extremely comfortable. The restaurant and bar area was good, although breakfasts a bit pricey for the basic fare. Better to walk a bit in ti town for wonderful pastries and coffee for a fraction of the cost.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in good lication

reviews.text: Staff always attentive and very good to respond to questions I requests.
reviews.title: Four star never felt so much like five!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a wonderful hotel. The staff are friendly and efficient. The rooms are spacious, immaculate and fashionably appointed.
reviews.title: Typical Hilton

reviews.text: Meals are superb, as are the hospitality staff.
reviews.title: Recommended business hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My only quibbles are (and I feel slightly bad for mentioning) that each room only supports one wifi device at a time (although there are no limits in public areas) and that the hotel is slightly out of town and because of one way systems, difficult to find. Having said that, I appreciate it not being in the centre as its so quiet here so have still given it top location marks.
reviews.title: Impressive new bulding, well appointed rooms, and much more.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn Lecce just for 1 night at the end of August. I would have loved to stay there longer, as I din't have the time to take advantage of all the wonderful services that this hotel offers.
reviews.title: amazing hotel in an amazing city

reviews.text: The rooms are very spacious and beautifully, modern furnished. Bathroom was huge with a nice shower.
reviews.title: The best place to stay when in Lecce for Business

reviews.text: We didn't have breakfast, as we left early in the morning. The room only rate was Euro 63,00 which is extremely cheap in comparison to what the hotel offers.
reviews.title: Modern and convenient

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were really impressed of this luxurius hotel. Located in the reasonable distance from the city center with the free shuttle transport was excellent choice. The hotel is really new, with helpful stuff, roomery very nices are nice decorated and really comfortable. We had the room on the 6th floor with nice view and just 1 floor upper on the roof was the swimming pool. Breakfast with wide variety of italian and internation food was very very nice! I van highly reccomend this hotel.
reviews.title: Really impressed hotel!

reviews.text: We spent two nights here at the Hilton Garden Inn in Lecce. The location isn't to far from the center of Lecce, where all the sites are. It's in a good location to drive to the beach for the afternoon as well. The service at the Cube restaurant was nice, but they could have turned down the lights in the evening inside so it wasn't so bright while dining. The staff was amazing, a couple came in and wanted to sit outside and they moved a table from the inside to the outside because all the outside tables were taken. Excellent service!!! Also, we stayed on the 6th floor and it would have been nice to have chairs and a table to enjoy the outside. There is a huge patio off the room but nowhere to sit. Very quick to service our needs and a FABULOUS pool on the 7th floor where the spa is located. It has a panoramic view and is geared more or less to adults relaxing vs. getting crazy with the kids. Overall a nice place to stay when you are missing a bit of your American comforts. They even have coffee in the room!!!! We have stayed in many places in Italy that they don't so this was a nice surprise!!!! www.gibsonchop.com
reviews.title: Crisp and Clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was good choice as we had a car which would ha ve been a nightmare in Lecce itself. We were able to get into Lecce centre within 10 mins by shuttle and 20 minutes walking back. We were able to get to the coast within 30 mins
reviews.title: Excellent spot though outside of the centre roof pool and good food

reviews.text: The hotel restaurant did local specialities and the whole atmosphere was very relaxing although this is essentially a business hotel. Staff were very helpful
reviews.title: Worth a Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I live in Italy and did a two-night stay in Lecce with our 18-year old daughter. We were given a room with twin beds but they were more like doubles, so it was easy for my wife and I to share one. The room was spacious enough for the three of us and had the standard HGI appointments (refrigerator, desk, wireless and wired internet), but no microwave. There is a hotel shuttle that can take you into the town of Lecce, but we elected to walk - it was a pleasant walk and not too far. The hotel is pretty new and very clean. There is a gym free to hotel guests - it is reasonably equipped but a bit undersized. There is also a Spa in the hotel but it requires separate payment (a bit of a disappointment since the pool was also closed until summer), The breakfast was really nice; dinner was OK.
reviews.title: A very pleasant stay in a lovely city
